string.text: Noah has asked for your help clearing mutants away from his barge. Locate and eliminate the pack that threatened him.

Mutants man, mutants! They're crawling all over this place! Help me take care of them, will you? There's a big boy that came by here a while ago, I'll show you where it went. Help me out and I'll help you.
Ah, you have done well. Don't worry, that scar will barely be noticeable. Take this as payment, and stop back any time you want to do some more hunting.
Noah's mutant pet is hungry for %s. Better find some soon before she decides to eat Noah.
Where the hell have you been? I'm out of dog food! Get me some damn %s to feed my dog! This little bitch is gonna eat me out of house and home. She's a looker though, ain't she? Just like her master.
About damn time! Here you go girl, eat up. She's such a pretty lass. Look at how full that coat is. What? You still here? Here, take this if it will get you to go away.
Noah is having trouble keeping the area clear of mutants. Help him out.
You're late! There's mutants everywhere out here! You expect me to keep killing them all? Get the hell out there and help me get rid of them damn things!

You've been gone all day! How long does it take to kill a couple damn mutants? Here, take your pay and get the hell off my boat. And pet my dog on the way out, will you? She loves attention... and stalker fingers.
